name: Time to Feast (Event Horizon School)
description:
Time to Feast is an Action videogame in which you will find yourself playing the role of a vampire.

You must escape from a catacomb where you were imprisoned, awaiting for your fate to be decided. Your life is at stake.

After all, you must be submitted to a trial in which it will be judged whether you’re worthy of being killed and consumed in order to enhance another vampire’s power. 

You will have to fight your own way through the various rooms, past hordes of three types of enemies.

If you are successful in doing so, you will be rewarded with great power that will allow you to gradually increase your strength. 

Will you manage to find who locked you there and defeat them?

FEATURES LIST:

  • Movement system on Y and X axis
  • Attack with LMC
  • Abilities
  • Health System
  • Wave System
  • Four types of enemies

DEVELOPED BY:

HATEFUL GOATS

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1, 2021/2022)

Programming:

  • Davide Balan

Game Design:

  • Matteo Palermo
  • Stefano Schiavolini

3D Art:

  • Gabriele Musi

Concept Art:

  • Irene Cancellara

Voice Actors:

  • Irene Cancellara
  • Zizou (@tombdude)

Music:

  • Gabriele Musi
